name: Profanation 2: Escape from Abu Simbel
description: Profanation 2: Escape from Abu Simbel is an unofficial sequel to Abu Simbel Profanation, and it starts in the same place, where the first part has ended. The words cursed Johnny Jones heard in the mortuary chamber gave him, even at that moment of terror, a hope: See you at the North Pole. So, based on his calculations, he should cross the hollow Earth through the zone of stones, the jungle zone and the ice zone according to the legends hoping to reach 'The Pole' and hoping to escape Abu Simbel. The gameplay is extremely hard side view platformer, where the player should jump with a highest accuracy and avoid the numerous obstacles.

shot.caption: Intro shows the end of "Abu Simbel Profanation"
Flying deep to the center of the earth
